name: "SomervilleGuide"
0:
”Alexa open Somerville Guide”
”Alexa ask Somerville Guide for an activity”
”Alexa ask Somerville Guide where should I go”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: somerville guide
des: Do you need inspiration regarding what to do in the city of Somerville, MA? Ask Alexa to open the 'Somerville Guide' and ask for an activity and you will be given a random activity that can be done in Somerville.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
